text: Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still edible.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries are not.
There are more possible iterations of a game of chess than there are atoms in the known universe.
Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped.
The shortest war in history was between Britain and Zanzibar on August 27, 1896. Zanzibar surrendered after 38 minutes.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
The inventor of the Pringles can, Fred Baur, was cremated and buried in one.
A single strand of spaghetti is called a spaghetto.
The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during hot days because metal expands with heat.
Koalas have fingerprints that are so similar to humans' that they have on occasion been confused at crime scenes.
Sloths can take up to a month to digest a single meal.
The world's largest desert is Antarctica.
The inventor of the lightbulb, Thomas Edison, was afraid of the dark.
Sharks existed before trees.
A human could swim through a blue whale's veins.
An apple, potato, and onion all taste the same if you eat them with your nose plugged.
The word 'nerd' was first coined by Dr. Seuss in 'If I Ran the Zoo.'
Cows have best friends and can become stressed when they are separated.
The Guinness Book of World Records was created to settle bar bets.
If you could fold a piece of paper 42 times, it would reach the moon.
Your nose and ears continue to grow throughout your life.
Hot water freezes faster than cold water, a phenomenon known as the Mpemba effect.
Scotland’s national animal is the unicorn.
Honey is the only food that includes all the substances necessary to sustain life, including water.
A bolt of lightning contains enough energy to toast 100,000 slices of bread.
There is a species of jellyfish that is biologically immortal.
The world’s smallest reptile was discovered in 2021 in Madagascar. It’s just 0.53 inches long.
The dot over the letter 'i' and 'j' is called a tittle.
People who donate blood in Sweden receive a thank-you text when their blood is used.
It’s impossible to hum while holding your nose.
Humans are the only animals that blush.
Cleopatra lived closer in time to the first moon landing than to the construction of the Great Pyramid.
The shortest scientific paper ever published was by Dr. Dennis Upper on his study of writer's block. It was one blank page.
A crocodile cannot stick its tongue out.
The average person will spend six months of their life waiting for red lights to turn green.
A small child could swim through the veins of a blue whale.
Oxford University is older than the Aztec Empire.
A jiffy is an actual unit of time, measuring 1/100th of a second.
In Japan, there are more pets than children.
You can't taste food without saliva.
Venus is the only planet that rotates clockwise.
The inventor of the frisbee was turned into a frisbee after he died.
The Great Wall of China is not visible from space with the naked eye.
The largest snowflake ever recorded was 15 inches wide.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
Human thigh bones are stronger than concrete.
A snail can sleep for three years.
You can't hum while holding your nose closed.
If you lift a kangaroo’s tail off the ground it can’t hop.
The average person walks the equivalent of five times around the world in their lifetime.
Cats have fewer toes on their back paws.
A dime has 118 ridges on its edge.
